bibl.title: Supplying the Roman Army: O. Petr. 245.
bibl.note: Demonstrates that, at least in the case of O. Tait Petrie 245, civilians supplied the Roman army, and that given this, it is not unreasonable to suggest that they were involved in a substantial capacity throughout the Empire, and that texts showing the same phenomenon are more likely to concern civilians.
ADAMS Colin E.P., Supplying the Roman Army: O. Petr. 245.
